post:
I have two yearly 128 MB plans at BuyVM which I would like to transfer to someone needing the plans.
Both servers are valid till next September and prices should be arranged over PMs (message me if you're interested).
@Aldryic & @Francisco have both told me transfers are fine between existing clients of BuyVM and established members of this community (pretty much, it's up to them if you're eligible for a transfer ;P)
Thanks, Max.
